author: kou
msg: Add workaround for different time precisions between Subversion and Ruby on
Windows.
* subversion/bindings/swig/ruby/test/test_fs.rb
(SvnFsTest#test_transaction): Hack solution to problem of Subversion and
Ruby using clocks with different precisions in this test.
Patch by: Joe Swatosh

author: lgo
msg: * trunk: add the tsvn:logwidthmarker property, which is used by both Subclipse
and TortoiseSVN to show a marker in the commit dialog at width 80. This will
help Windows committers to follow the svn commit standards.

author: malcolm
msg: Comment-only followup to r22991.
* subversion/libsvn_wc/adm_ops.c
(process_committed_internal): Clarify comment.  The important part is that
the log is being created here (or, rather, not), not that it's being
executed, since the latter happens elsewhere.

author: nori
msg: Japanese translation updates.
* subversion/po/ja.po: Update translation against r23062 by working on
untranslated/fuzzy entries added at r22972:23062.
Now ja.po has 1533 translated messages against r23062 (Emacs PO-mode

author: hwright
msg: * subversion/libsvn_wc/props.c:
Remove unneeded include of stdio.h.
